text: @SenSherrodBrown @zachbraff So if they were still staffed we wouldn't of had this "pandemic"? Isn't the reason all these precautions are happening is because of how fast this virus popped up? How fast this virus spreads? And you're saying these people would've caught it before then ? Doubt it .
